c_notificationInfoPopover: Some of your customers might not be connected to the internet, when you send out the notification. Setting an expiry will ensure that your customers do not receive a notification for a time sensitive event when they log back in. For example, if your notification is about an offer you are running  for 2 days in the store (Feb-28 thru Feb-29) and you set the expiration to 2 days. Any customer who is not connected to the Internet will not receive the notification if they login on March-01
